slicingProfile.name: Red_01
slicingProfile.gCodeHeader:
G21 ;Set units to be mm
G91 ;Relative Positioning
M17 ;Enable motors
slicingProfile.gCodeLift:
G1 Z${ZLiftDist} F${ZLiftRate} ; lift sequence distance and height
G1 Z-${(ZLiftDist - LayerThickness)} F${ZLiftRate*3} ; lower, minus layer thickness, at triple the lift rate
G4 S2 ; Dwell to make CWH wait until sequence is done until proceeding, plus 2 seconds for settling
